welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Raymond, Canada! Known for its charming small-town feel and breathtaking scenery, we invite you to explore and enjoy our vibrant city. We hope your stay here will be filled with unforgettable experiences."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Québec Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Québec Airport is used for domestic flights operated by Air Canada and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Québec Airport is used for international flights operated by airlines such as United, Delta, and Air France.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
